column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Love the ambiance of this restaurant. Came here for a fancy date night quite a bit ago
column2: but it sticks out in my mind. We were seated downstairs
column3: and walked through the 20s themed area on the main floor
column4: which was beautiful. Downstairs was much cozier
column6: was perfect! We ate some amazing food
column7: the boy had a delicious drink. The beef I had felt like it was melting in my mouth it was so tender. Would definitely recommend for a fancy night out on the town.
